review: It casts. Chrome stuff.  And many apps.  Works great. My kids think it's really funny when they hijack it with their iphones/ipads though.  Needs a "kid blocker" built in.  :)
author: TrailRunnerGuy

review: Great product.  Installation is very straight forward and works flawlessly (as described).  I had used other types of WiDi Devices but this one is much easier to use. Highly recommend the product.
author: MrIceMan

review: I bought this tonight and it's truly changed my life. Who needs cable when you can stream anything you want to your TV through your internet connection?Not to mention unlimited porn to your big screen. :) :) :)I may need to quit my job, gym membership, and dump my girlfriend to make room for the new love my of my life. CHROMECAST!
author: zman1975

review: Great product but doesn't work on college campuses.  Make sure to check whether it works before ordering it for your dorm!  Chromecast doesn't work on networks the same way Roku does.
author: Victoria Mount

review: A bit geeky to setup and learn to use, but very useful and fun. Can't beat it for the price.If you try to stream HD video from a Chrome web browser running on a PC, it will take a quad core CPU and fast video card to do it.
